about_the_game:
The game is focused on meeting girls on a holiday island. You will stay there, working and learning new skills. You will interact with the girls and if you do things right, you might get more intimate with them.

The game will have different windows, where you interact with the girls in the main window and have access to skills in another. You can spend your time swimming at the beach or working at the local farm, earning money to buy food or gifts for the girls. Or you can spend it learning bartending or a new language or other things to have more in common with the girl you would want to get to know more closely.

The game is not a "clicker-game". It is more centered around leisure and interaction with the girls, and balancing your time between earning money and learning skills.

The girls will all have different needs. When you spend time (meaning activating a job or a skill to practice in the job/skill window) learning or earning, the stats and money you have will increase and in time unlock what you can buy for the girls and what you can interact with them about. This again will level up your relationship with them individually, and will unlock how intimate you will be able to be with them.

Intimacy practically means unlocking cut-scenes and new dialog.

content_descriptors.notes: By following the girls story-line you will encounter more and more reviling images of them, all the way to sexual intercourse
